description: A workflow specification connection represents a many-to-many link between workflow specification nodes.
comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.04-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 4: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

contents.name: definedBy
contents.description: The workflow specification connection defined by this workflow specification connection type.

contents.name: hasPropertiesOf
contents.description: The workflow specification connection property(s) defines in part of this workflow specification connection.

contents.name: connectsTo
contents.description: The workflow specification node connected to this workflow specification connection.

contents.name: connectsFrom
contents.description: The workflow specification node connected from this workflow specification connection.

contents.name: dependencyType
contents.description: Defines the execution dependency constraints of one workflow specification node to another workflow specification node as the type of the execution or dependency factor between the them.

enumValues.name: possibleParallel
enumValues.description: B may run in parallel to A

enumValues.name: notInParallel
enumValues.description: B may not run in parallel to A

enumValues.name: noLaterAfterStart
enumValues.description: start B no later than dependency factor after A start

enumValues.name: noEarlierAfterStart
enumValues.description: start B no earlier than dependency factor after A start

enumValues.name: noLaterAfterEnd
enumValues.description: start B no later than dependency factor after A end

enumValues.name: noEarlierAfterEnd
enumValues.description: B no earlier than dependency factor after A end

contents.name: dependencyFactorUnitOfMeasure
contents.description: The units of measure of the dependency factor
